column3: Temperature-Motion Position Compensation Mount exceeds the limit.
column5: Sub code: Temperature-Motion Position Compensation Mount
column7:
(1) Check the U-Axis encoder temperature in Servo Monitor display. (Set the security to management mode. And select a sub menu [SERVO MONITOR] under main menu [ROBOT] )
Normal value is between 20 to 100 °C
(2) Turn the power OFF then back ON.

(1) Reset the alarm, and then try again. 
(2) Confirm the following setting value.
・ Temperature-Motion Position Compensation standard temperature（S1C*G0361）
・ Temperature-Motion Position Compensation Maximum mount （S1C*G0362）
・ Temperature-Motion Position Compensation Minimum mount （S1C*G0363）
(3) If the alarm occurs again, save the CMOS.BIN in maintenance mode, and then contact your Yaskawa representative about occurrence status (operating procedure).
